title: Top Pediatric Health Tips for New Parents
description: Raising a healthy child starts with the right information from trusted doctors which can change your lifestyle.
author: Dr. Emily Carter

title: How to Boost Your Child's Immunity Naturally
description: Explore doctor-approved methods to enhance your child's immune system using nutrition, sleep, and natural remedies.
author: Dr. James Nguyen

title: Screen Time and Kids: What Parents Need to Know
description: Learn how to set healthy screen time boundaries and encourage more active, mindful habits in children.
author: Dr. Sarah Mitchell

title: The Importance of Mental Health in Children
description: Discover the role of mental health in children and how to support their well-being.
author: Dr. Michael Patel

title: The Benefits of Regular Exercise for Children
description: Explore the physical and mental health benefits of regular exercise for children, from early on.
author: Dr. Olivia Thompson

title: The Importance of Food for Children's Health
description: Learn about the role of food in children's development and how to support a balanced diet.
author: Dr. Daniel Lee
